message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $120. I believe it's a great deal and would be very useful for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm only willing to pay up to $95 for it. Please let me know if this is within your range.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $95 is too low for me. How about $110?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still not able to go above $95 for this product. Could we meet somewhere in the middle?
